tool_description: Find & Explore Jobs/Projects (fixed prices/hourly paid) on 'Freelancer.com' platform, and find the best job that fits your skills in different fields like (Cyber Security, Marketing, Design, Programming, Website development and more...).
name: Freelancer API
title: Freelancer API

api_list.name: Get all freelancers in specific page
api_list.description: fetch all of the freelancers per specific page and the default number of freelancers search results is 10 (values may change).

api_list.name: Get all freelancers
api_list.description: getting all of the freelancers and some details (title, rating, total earnings, reviews, description, hourly rate) and the default number of freelancers per request is 10 (values may change).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freelancer-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/find-freelancers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freelancer-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all jobs in specific page
api_list.description: this endpoint gets all of the jobs in specific page (default is the first page) till 100 pages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freelancer-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/find-job/100"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freelancer-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Jobs
api_list.description: this endpoints gets all of the listed jobs for different skills and prices and bids number.
